name: Outpost
LocationDStext: Unless opponent's matching operative at same or related site, those sites are immune to [Premium] No Escape.  (Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)
LocationLStext: May not deploy to Bespin, Coruscant, Dantooine, Kessel or Tatooine. Once per game, may deploy a device (except a comlink) or Effect that deploys on a character here.
